help: index.js logs <name>   Get pod logs                       [aliases: l]
index.js get             get pods list in env
index.js get -e dev      get pods list in dev namespace
index.js get -s failed   get pods list with failed status
index.js get [pod-name]  get a single pod specific info for [pod-name]
index.js get -f views    get pods specific info filtered by name
